participant_1.background:
I am moving to a new city because my family is relocating.
i m dissatisfied with the school life i ve had so far.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
i have always wanted to travel to ireland or puerto rico.
The weather doesn't matter to me as long as I can go shopping and listen to rock music.

participant_2.background:
I love working the farm, and I get my exercise that way.
I have a baby mobile in my nursery that plays classical music to help my child sleep.
My flute playing is a form of self-expression and a way to connect with my inner self.
i can say the alphabet backwards.
My spouse is a doctor who works long hours, but I am grateful for their support.

content.text: Hey! I'm a bit excited and also a bit nervous about the move.
Hey! It's exciting, but I know what you mean. I love moving to new places.
Me too, but I always get a little sad to leave behind my old friends and places.
I feel that. I'm always sad when I have to leave my family and friends, but I always get excited to explore new places.
I've always wanted to travel to Ireland or Puerto Rico. What are some places you've always wanted to visit?
I've always wanted to go to Japan. I love the culture, the food, and the history.
Oh yeah, Japan would be awesome! I've heard the food is amazing.
It is! And I love the history there. I've always been fascinated by the samurai culture.
Me too! I've always wanted to learn how to use a sword.
You can learn how to use a sword here in the states. I know a few people who do it.
Oh really? I'll have to look into that.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. And it's a great workout.
Sounds like it! I'll have to check it out.
Let me know if you do. I'd love to hear how it goes.
